Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 59th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Eduardo Marpons (BRO)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Houston on 8/28/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2015, hitting .542 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2016, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/1/2017 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2017, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from New York to Cincinnati on 5/6/2018 (Going to CIN: RF Oliver Depaul. Going to NY: P Oscar Santiago, P Roberto Ortiz, P Jame Meany, 2B Bill Scott)...
